Objectiv Bach¶

Introduction¶

Objectiv Bach is an extension to the Series used in Bach. It allows for specific functionality on the stacks (global contexts and location stack) as used by Objectiv.

bach.Series reference¶

ObjectivStack(series_object)

SeriesGlobalContexts(engine, base_node, ...)

Objectiv Global Contexts series.

SeriesLocationStack(engine, base_node, ...)

Objectiv Location Stack series.

FeatureFrame(engine, base_node, index, ...)

Class that is based on Bach DataFrame.
